SimpleSysMon.PluginDescription: Simple System Monitor: Plugin for live analyzing and visualizing system load data.
SimpleSysMon.SettingsDescription: Settings for SimpleSysMon (Hint: This plugin has systemwide and personal settings)
SimpleSysMon.NetworkBandwidthHelp: This is the maximum reachable bandwidth of the server in kB/s (= kilobyte per second) and representates 100%. The value must be greater than 5.
SimpleSysMon.AutoRefreshDescription: Activates the automatic refresh of the values
SimpleSysMon.MemoryDisplayDescription: Choose which memory should be displayed
